Description_lang: The caster imbues their weapon with unstable flames, causing their melee attacks to inflict an additional $420339s1 Fire damage for $d.Additionally, the caster's weapon drops patches of flame at their target's location every $t1 sec, inflicting $420332s1 Fire damage to nearby players every $420332t1 sec.
AuraDescription_lang: Melee attacks inflict an additional $420339s1 Fire damage.Dropping patches of flame beneath their target every $t1 sec.
